text: The Commission shall make an annual report of its proceedings to the Council of the District of Columbia and the Mayor by March 31st of each year. The report shall contain the following:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., ยง 49-403.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-119, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 45-301.

DC CODE ยง 45-303

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A list of all topics considered by the Commission during the reported year;
The final disposition of all the topics;
A discussion of any problems which may have arisen after a change in legislation; and
The agenda of the Commission for the next reporting year.

title.text: Compilation and Construction of Code. (Refs & Annos)
